verses_data.english: The word of GOD came to me:

verses_data.hebrew: בֶּן־אָדָ֕ם שִׂ֥ים פָּנֶ֖יךָ עַל־הַ֣ר שֵׂעִ֑יר וְהִנָּבֵ֖א עָלָֽיו
verses_data.english: O mortal, set your face against Mount Seir and prophesy against it.

verses_data.hebrew: וְאָמַ֣רְתָּ לּ֗וֹ כֹּ֤ה אָמַר֙ אֲדֹנָ֣י יֱהֹוִ֔ה הִנְנִ֥י אֵלֶ֖יךָ הַר־שֵׂעִ֑יר וְנָטִ֤יתִי יָדִי֙ עָלֶ֔יךָ וּנְתַתִּ֖יךָ שְׁמָמָ֥ה וּמְשַׁמָּֽה
verses_data.english: Say to it: Thus said the Sovereign GOD: I am going to deal with you, Mount Seir: I will stretch out My hand against you and make you an utter waste.

verses_data.hebrew: עָרֶ֙יךָ֙ חׇרְבָּ֣ה אָשִׂ֔ים וְאַתָּ֖ה שְׁמָמָ֣ה תִֽהְיֶ֑ה וְיָדַעְתָּ֖ כִּֽי־אֲנִ֥י יְהֹוָֽה
verses_data.english: I will turn your towns into ruins, and you shall be a desolation; then you shall know that I am GOD.

verses_data.hebrew: יַ֗עַן הֱי֤וֹת לְךָ֙ אֵיבַ֣ת עוֹלָ֔ם וַתַּגֵּ֥ר אֶת־בְּנֵֽי־יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל עַל־יְדֵי־חָ֑רֶב בְּעֵ֣ת אֵידָ֔ם בְּעֵ֖ת עֲוֺ֥ן קֵֽץ
verses_data.english: Because you harbored an ancient hatred and handed the people of Israel over to the sword in their time of calamity, the time set for their punishment—

verses_data.hebrew: לָכֵ֣ן חַי־אָ֗נִי נְאֻם֙ אֲדֹנָ֣י יֱהֹוִ֔ה כִּֽי־לְדָ֥ם אֶעֶשְׂךָ֖ וְדָ֣ם יִרְדְּפֶ֑ךָ אִם־לֹ֥א דָ֛ם שָׂנֵ֖אתָ וְדָ֥ם יִרְדְּפֶֽךָ
verses_data.english: assuredly, as I live, declares the Sovereign GOD, I will doom you with blood; blood shall pursue you; I swear that, for your bloodthirsty hatred, blood shall pursue you.

verses_data.hebrew: וְנָֽתַתִּי֙ אֶת־הַ֣ר שֵׂעִ֔יר לְשִֽׁמְמָ֖ה וּשְׁמָמָ֑ה וְהִכְרַתִּ֥י מִמֶּ֖נּוּ עֹבֵ֥ר וָשָֽׁב
verses_data.english: I will make Mount Seir an utter waste, and I will keep all passersby away from it.

verses_data.hebrew: וּמִלֵּאתִ֥י אֶת־הָרָ֖יו חֲלָלָ֑יו גִּבְעוֹתֶ֤יךָ וְגֵיאוֹתֶ֙יךָ֙ וְכׇל־אֲפִיקֶ֔יךָ חַלְלֵי־חֶ֖רֶב יִפְּל֥וּ בָהֶֽם
verses_data.english: I will cover its mountains with the slain; those slain by the sword shall lie on your hills, in your valleys, and in all your watercourses.

verses_data.hebrew: שִֽׁמְמ֤וֹת עוֹלָם֙ אֶתֶּנְךָ֔ וְעָרֶ֖יךָ לֹ֣א (תישבנה) [תָשֹׁ֑בְנָה] וִידַעְתֶּ֖ם כִּֽי־אֲנִ֥י יְהֹוָֽה
verses_data.english: I will make you a desolation for all time; your towns shall never be inhabited. And you shall know that I am GOD.

verses_data.hebrew: יַ֣עַן אֲ֠מׇרְךָ֠ אֶת־שְׁנֵ֨י הַגּוֹיִ֜ם וְאֶת־שְׁתֵּ֧י הָאֲרָצ֛וֹת לִ֥י תִהְיֶ֖ינָה וִֽירַשְׁנ֑וּהָ וַיהֹוָ֖ה שָׁ֥ם הָיָֽה {ס}
verses_data.english: Because you thought “The two nations and the two lands shall be mine and we shall possess them”—although GOD was there—

verses_data.hebrew: לָכֵ֣ן חַי־אָ֗נִי נְאֻם֮ אֲדֹנָ֣י יֱהֹוִה֒ וְעָשִׂ֗יתִי כְּאַפְּךָ֙ וּכְקִנְאָ֣תְךָ֔ אֲשֶׁ֣ר עָשִׂ֔יתָה מִשִּׂנְאָתֶ֖יךָ בָּ֑ם וְנוֹדַ֥עְתִּי בָ֖ם כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר אֶשְׁפְּטֶֽךָ
verses_data.english: assuredly, as I live, declares the Sovereign GOD, I will act with the same anger and passion that you acted with in your hatred of them. And I will make Myself known through them when I judge you.

verses_data.hebrew: וְֽיָדַעְתָּ֮ כִּ֣י אֲנִ֣י יְהֹוָה֒ שָׁמַ֣עְתִּי ׀ אֶת־כׇּל־נָאָֽצוֹתֶ֗יךָ אֲשֶׁ֥ר אָמַ֛רְתָּ עַל־הָרֵ֥י יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל לֵאמֹ֣ר ׀ [שָׁמֵ֑מוּ] (שממה) לָ֥נוּ נִתְּנ֖וּ לְאׇכְלָֽה
verses_data.english: You shall know that I, GOD, have heard all the taunts you uttered against the hills of Israel: “They have been laid waste; they have been given to us as prey.”

verses_data.hebrew: וַתַּגְדִּ֤ילוּ עָלַי֙ בְּפִיכֶ֔ם וְהַעְתַּרְתֶּ֥ם עָלַ֖י דִּבְרֵיכֶ֑ם אֲנִ֖י שָׁמָֽעְתִּי {ס}
verses_data.english: And you spoke arrogantly against Me and multiplied your words against Me: I have heard it.

verses_data.hebrew: כֹּ֥ה אָמַ֖ר אֲדֹנָ֣י יֱהֹוִ֑ה כִּשְׂמֹ֙חַ֙ כׇּל־הָאָ֔רֶץ שְׁמָמָ֖ה אֶעֱשֶׂה־לָּֽךְ
verses_data.english: Thus said the ETERNAL God: When the whole earth rejoices, I will make you a desolation.

verses_data.hebrew: כְּשִׂמְחָ֨תְךָ֜ לְנַחֲלַ֧ת בֵּֽית־יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל עַ֥ל אֲשֶׁר־שָׁמֵ֖מָה כֵּ֣ן אֶעֱשֶׂה־לָּ֑ךְ שְׁמָמָ֨ה תִהְיֶ֤ה הַר־שֵׂעִיר֙ וְכׇל־אֱד֣וֹם כֻּלָּ֔הּ וְיָדְע֖וּ כִּי־אֲנִ֥י יְהֹוָֽה {פ}
verses_data.english: As you rejoiced when the heritage of the House of Israel was laid waste, so will I treat you: the hill country of Seir and the whole of Edom, all of it, shall be laid waste. And they shall know that I am GOD.
